languages.text: {n}Друкари делает шаг вперед — и вдруг останавливается и бросает взгляд на вас.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, ты был{mf||а} столь прилежн{mf|ым|ой} учени{mf|ком|цей}... почему бы тебе не выбрать, как умрет этот скот". {n}Маражай следит за каждым движением вашего лица.{/n}

{n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари делает шаг вперед — и вдруг останавливается и бросает взгляд на вас.{/n} "Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, ты был{mf||а} столь прилежн{mf|ым|ой} учени{mf|ком|цей}... почему бы тебе не выбрать, как умрет этот скот". {n}Маражай следит за каждым движением вашего лица.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

{n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

{n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

{n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋朝前走了一步，随后突然停了下来，看着你。{/n}“我的小宠物，你一直都是我勤勉的好学生……这些牲畜会怎么死，不如由你来决定吧？”{n}玛拉斋的双眼紧紧地盯着你的脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋朝前走了一步，随后突然停了下来，看着你。{/n}“我的小宠物，你一直都是我勤勉的好学生……这些牲畜会怎么死，不如由你来决定吧？”{n}玛拉斋的双眼紧紧地盯着你的脸。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは一歩前に進むと、不意に立ち止まってこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}「俺の可愛いペット、お前はこれまで中々の優等生だったが…この家畜共の死に方を選んでみるのはどうだ？」{n}マラズハイの目が、あなたのあらゆる表情の動きを観察している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは一歩前に進むと、不意に立ち止まってこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}「俺の可愛いペット、お前はこれまで中々の優等生だったが…この家畜共の死に方を選んでみるのはどうだ？」{n}マラズハイの目が、あなたのあらゆる表情の動きを観察している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai da un paso al frente... y de pronto se detiene y te mira.{/n} «Ah, mascotita, has sido un{mf||a} estudiante modelo... ¿Y si eliges cómo matar a este ganado?». {n}Los ojos de Marazhai se clavan en tu cara, analizando cada movimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai da un paso al frente... y de pronto se detiene y te mira.{/n} «Ah, mascotita, has sido un{mf||a} estudiante modelo... ¿Y si eliges cómo matar a este ganado?». {n}Los ojos de Marazhai se clavan en tu cara, analizando cada movimiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait un pas en avant, puis il s'interrompt subitement et vous regarde.{/n} « {mf|Mon brave petit|Ma brave petite} esclave, puisque vous vous êtes {mf|conduit|conduite} en élève modèle, je vous laisse l'honneur de décider du sort de ces moutons. » {n}Les yeux de Marazhai scrutent la moindre expression de votre visage.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait un pas en avant, puis il s'interrompt subitement et vous regarde.{/n} « {mf|Mon brave petit|Ma brave petite} esclave, puisque vous vous êtes {mf|conduit|conduite} en élève modèle, je vous laisse l'honneur de décider du sort de ces moutons. » {n}Les yeux de Marazhai scrutent la moindre expression de votre visage.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tritt einen Schritt vor – hält dann aber plötzlich inne und sieht dich an.{/n} "{mf|Mein treuer Ergebener|Meine treue Ergebene}, Ihr wart mir {mf|ein|eine} wahrhaft {mf|eifriger Jünger|eifrige Jüngerin} ... Warum entscheidet Ihr nicht also, wie dieses Vieh verrecken soll?" {n}Marazhais Augen verfolgen jede deiner Gesichtsbewegungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai tritt einen Schritt vor – hält dann aber plötzlich inne und sieht dich an.{/n} "{mf|Mein treuer Ergebener|Meine treue Ergebene}, Ihr wart mir {mf|ein|eine} wahrhaft {mf|eifriger Jünger|eifrige Jüngerin} ... Warum entscheidet Ihr nicht also, wie dieses Vieh verrecken soll?" {n}Marazhais Augen verfolgen jede deiner Gesichtsbewegungen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, ileri doğru bir adım atıyor ve aniden duraksayarak sana bakıyor.{/n} "Minik hayvanım, nasıl da çalışkan bir öğrenci oldun... Bu sığırların nasıl öleceğine neden sen karar vermiyorsun?" {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, yüzündeki her bir hareketi takip ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai takes a step forward — and then suddenly stops and looks at you.{/n} "My little pet, you have been such a diligent student... Why don't you choose how these cattle will die?" {n}Marazhai's eyes track every movement of your face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, ileri doğru bir adım atıyor ve aniden duraksayarak sana bakıyor.{/n} "Minik hayvanım, nasıl da çalışkan bir öğrenci oldun... Bu sığırların nasıl öleceğine neden sen karar vermiyorsun?" {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, yüzündeki her bir hareketi takip ediyor.{/n}
